channel.title: Once 99?
channel.description:
ok i wanna make so once the persone reaches 99 that it will give them a skillcape and hood.......but only when its 99.......how would i do this?
thanks! :D

item.title: Once 99?
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“doggiedoo86, post:12, topic:141357”][quote author=Rudolph link=topic=193576.msg1740043#msg1740043 date=1189276862]

This is not the real code but it would be like this:

playergets99skill [7] 99 giveitem [####,####] sendmessage" You get 99 [Skillname] Have a Skillcape";

Lol? ;D
[/quote] First of all…it’s not giveitem. It’s additem. 2nd of all that sendMessage isn’t even correct. And playergets99skill? Lol…Let me give you the real coding :s

sendFrame164(6247); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(####, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Attack skill cape!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!"); }

There you go, enjoy.

Where does it go ;D[/quote] Wow, no one anser this obvious question

Read full topic
